short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu item to create an event in google calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to select text in chrome, right click, and choose from the context menu an item that opens the google calendar event dialogue.
